data.name: Status_Connected
data.comment: Device connection status when successfully connected

data.name: Status_Disconnected
data.comment: Device connection status when not connected

data.name: Status_Error
data.comment: Device connection status when an error occurred

data.name: Status_PassiveMonitoring
data.comment: Device connection status when passively monitoring bus traffic

data.name: Status_PassiveMonitoringFormat
data.comment: Brief status format for passive monitoring. {0} = baud rate

data.name: Device_SerialNumberPrefix
data.comment: Prefix for device serial number display

data.name: Status_ConnectionFormat
data.comment: Brief connection status format. {0} = address, {1} = baud rate

data.comment: Status when attempting to connect to device

data.comment: Status when security key is invalid

data.comment: Status when starting device discovery

data.name: Status_AttemptingToDiscoverAtBaudRate
data.value: 尝试在 上发现设备 {0}
data.comment: Status when discovering at specific baud rate. {0} = baud rate

data.comment: Status when device found at baud rate. {0} = baud rate

data.value: 尝试确定设备 {0} with 地址 {1}
data.comment: Status when determining device. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.value: 尝试识别 的设备 {0} with 地址 {1}
data.comment: Status when identifying device. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_AttemptingToGetCapabilities
data.value: 尝试获取 设备的功能 {0} with 地址 {1}
data.comment: Status when getting device capabilities. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_SuccessfullyDiscovered
data.value: 成功发现设备 {0} with 地址 {1}
data.comment: Status when device successfully discovered. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_FailedToConnect
data.comment: Status when connection failed

data.name: Status_ErrorWhileDiscovering
data.comment: Status when error occurred during discovery

data.name: Status_CancelledDiscovery
data.comment: Status when discovery was cancelled

data.name: Status_AttemptingToConnectManually
data.comment: Status when attempting manual connection

data.comment: Status when device disconnected due to USB removal

data.comment: Message when USB device is disconnected
